MS MCQs

    Manage inbound serial and lot numbers in Dynamics 365 Business Central

    »

    1. Which one of the following statements about item tracking for inbound transactions is true?

      You can receive items that are set up for specific serial number tracking without serial numbers and assign them afterward on the item ledger entries.

      You can use the Create Customize Serial No. function to create a series of serial numbers based on a format and increment-by number.

      It is not possible to use the No. series option in the Serial Nos. field on the item card to assign serial numbers on the Item Tracking Lines page of a purchase order.

      You can enter the lot numbers that you receive on the purchase order lines.


    2. You recently posted a purchase receipt for an item that is set up with specific lot tracking. Where can you check the lot numbers that are received?

      On the item ledger entries and value entries

      On the item ledger entries and G/L entries

      On the item ledger entries and customer ledger entries

      Only on item ledger entries
